showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ The Venetian Pool has nothing of Venetian, and the pool is just a pool where people go inside without taking a shower, because it is not enforced. So it is basically a public bath. If you try to rest or take a nap it is impossible. Every 10 ‚Ä¶
I went there for my Birthday, I had a great time. Free parking, shade or sun, restroom with shower and locker... safer, and cleaner than any Miami south beach.
Nice to visit outside, but overpricing for a pool shower
